questions.png.description: A collection of thought bubbles with question marks

wealth-v-life.png.description: A scatter plot showing median life expectancy v. per-capita income of 192 countries. The point cloud rises rapidly at first, before flattening out

wealth-v-life-linear.png.description: An LR plot showing median life expectancy v. per-capita income of 192 countries. The point cloud rises rapidly at first, before flattening out. The linear model has only a moderate fit (R^2=0.413)

wealth-v-life-transformed.png.description: An scatter plot showing median life expectancy v. log of per-capita income of 192 countries. The point cloud goes up linearly as log-income increases

wealth-v-life-transformed-linear.png.description: An LR plot showing median life expectancy v. per-capita income of 192 countries. The point cloud rises rapidly at first, before flattening out. The linear model has a slope of 5.169, and y-intercept of 24.264, with a good fit (R^2=0.663)

wealth-v-life-log.png.description: An scatter plot showing median life expectancy v. per-capita income of 192 countries. A logarithmic model with a coefficient of 5.169 and a y-intercept of 24.264 is fit to the plot, and fits well (R^2=0.663)

graph-settings.png.description: A modified screenshot of the graph settings panel from Desmos, highlighting relevant buttons

difference-table-exponential-2.png.description: A table with columns for x (1,2,3,4,5) and y (2,4,8,16,32), arrows showing the factor by which each y-value value is multiplied (2,2,2,2) over a constant increase in x

difference-table-logarithmic.png.description: A table with columns for x (2,4,8,16,32) and y (1,2,3,4,5), arrows showing the factor by which each x-value value is multiplied (2,2,2,2) to get a constant increase in y

decibels-table.png.description: A table showing varying sound intensity levels (i.e., whisper, fortissimo, jet take-off) in watts per square meter and in decibels
